resources.string: Please try again in a few minutes.
Something went wrong with the wallet
Please define a smartphone passcode so that you can use the app.
Your internet connection seems off, take a moment to check what\'s wrong and retry
You can still log in with your password, if biometrics are not working
Log in to the swiyu app
Allow access to the camera for scanning QR codes to receive credentials or perform a check.
Access to the camera has expired and must be renewed.
Please change the necessary permissions in the device settings.\n\nTo scan QR codes, the app must access the camera.
Point the camera at the QR code and identify yourself. Only use QR codes from trustworthy sources.
An internet connection is required to process the code.
You do not possess a compatible credential in your wallet.
Something went wrong during the scanning process.
The presentation object contains invalid fields.
The credetial has an error and cannot be used nor saved.
If there is something incorrect about the data shown above, please contact the issuer before proceeding.
Scan the QR code. To identify or add credentials.
Please select the correct credential below and click on it.
You do not possess a compatible credential in your wallet.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua.

If you received a QR code after the theory test, scan it or click on the link you received. You will then receive your electronic learner\'s permit.\n\nYou have not received a QR code or text message?
You can find more information here
The verification was canceled and no data was transferred.

Your information has been successfully submitted, but your certificate has been declared invalid by the issuing road traffic office (e.g. suspended certificate).\n\nFor more information, please contact them.
The device has no compatible biometric hardware.
Your biometrics have been deactivated because you changed your code.
Help improve the swiyu app by anonymously sharing error reports and crashes – making it even better.

Help us to improve the app by allowing the following anonymised error messages to be made available to the development team:


✓ General error messages
✓ Communication errors
✓ App crashes


Only anonymised data that does not allow any conclusions to be drawn about you will be analysed.

Below is the list of software licenses used by this app.\n The licenses follow the BIT guidelines for compliance with privacy and the latest security standards. With this list we want to ensure transparency towards the users.
The swiyu app is open source. Its source code can be viewed on GitHub.
The authors assume no liability whatsoever with regard to the reliability and completeness of the information. References and links to third-party websites are outside our area of responsibility.
Would you like to activate biometrics to unlock the app?
Log in to confirm the Biometrics activation
Log in to confirm the deactivation of Biometrics
You can continue to use your code if it does not work with Biometrics.
The biometrics usage is temporarily locked. You can try to enable them at a later time.
To add IDs and documents, scan the QR code or open the link in the text message.
To add IDs and documents, scan the QR code or open the link in the text message.
Your ID data is encrypted and stored locally in the swiyu app on your mobile phone.
Welcome to the onboarding for the swiyu app.
If biometric unlocking does not work, you can still use your password.
Do you want to use your face or fingerprint to unlock the app?
Sorry, the swiyu app cannot currently be loaded. Please try again.
Biometric unlocking is not activated for this app.
Biometric unlocking is not activated for this device.
Please activate biometric unlocking in your settings.
Try to activate biometric unlocking later.
Your settings are being applied. This may take up to 30 seconds.
Your swiyu app now has optimal protection against unauthorised access.
Camera access has expired. Please allow access again.
Please go to Settings and allow access.\n\nWithout a camera, you cannot receive IDs and documents or identify yourself.
The camera is an important function. Without a camera, you cannot receive IDs and documents or identify yourself.
If you decline the credential now, it will immediately become invalid.\n\nYou must then request a new credential.

Once issued, a credential cannot be changed.

If you notice an error in your data, please contact the issuer.
They can issue a new, corrected credential.
This credential, along with all associated data, will be completely deleted from this device.

Once issued, a credential cannot be changed.

If you notice an error in your data, please contact the issuer.
They can issue a new, corrected credential.
No QR code found. Try to reposition the camera.
The swiyu app wants to access your camera
To identify yourself or add IDs and documents.
This QR code has already been used. Please request a new QR code.
Was the QR code used without your knowledge?
Please wait. Your details are being sent
Your data could not be processed.
Verification has failed. Please try again later or contact support.
The verification was canceled and no data was transferred.
Verification of the transmitted data has failed.
Please check the validity of your credential.
Would like to check your age
Would like to check your credential
Sorry, no details could be sent
Your details have been successfully checked.
Would like to issue the following credential:
Please unlock the app to continue.
Sorry, the swiyu app is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
The password is incorrect. Please try again.

plurals.item: The password is incorrect. You have %s attempt remaining.
The password is incorrect. You have %s attempts remaining.

resources.string: Incorrect password entered too many times. Please set a new password.
The passwords do not match. Please try again.
Enter new password with at least six characters
Thanks to the swiyu app, you always have your ID with you on your mobile phone.
You have control over who can check your ID data, and when. No access without permission.
Contribute anonymously to improving the app
Take advantage of an app tailored to your needs. Do you want to share your anonymous user data with the development team in return?
Protect your app from unauthorised access.
The passwords do not match. Please try again.
Password must be at least 6 characters
Failed to set up the password
Incorrect password entered too many times. Please set a new password.
Secure the app with a password
Federal Finance Administration FFA\nFederal Office of Information Technology, Systems and Telecommunication FOITT
The authors do not accept any liability for the reliability and completeness of the information. References and links to third-party websites are outside our area of responsibility. (deepl)

When sharing diagnostic data, swyiu occasionally sends anonymous, non-personal information. This helps us to continuously improve the app and to fix bugs faster. It is not possible to draw any conclusions about you as a person. (deepl)
Please enter your swiyu password to disable biometric unlocking.
Please enter your swiyu password to activate biometric unlocking.

The following is a list of the software licences used by this app.\n\nThe licences follow the guidelines of the Federal IT Office for compliance with privacy and the latest security standards. With this list, we want to ensure transparency for users.
swiyu is open-source. Its source code can be viewed on GitHub. (deepl)
This QR code is no longer valid, please create a new one.
This credential cannot be added to the swiyu app.
This QR code cannot be used.
Your swiyu app does not contain any matching credential.
Your swiyu app does not contain any credentials.
Add a Beta-ID to test the swiyu app.
Via the following link, you will be redirected to an external website where you can create Beta-IDs.\n\nAfterwards, you can import them and test the swiyu app with them.
Would like to issue the following credential:
Your device does not support Strongbox. (deepl)
Biometrics are not activated on this device. Go to the device settings to activate biometrics. (deepl)
Help us improve swyiu by allowing the occasional, anonymous submission of information such as error messages and crashes. (deepl)
Password must be at least 6 characters
First, your ID will be checked. This is followed by an identity check.\n\nIn the best case, it takes about 5 minutes. (deepl)
Exceptions\nProtecting your identity is our top priority. In rare cases, the identity check requires additional verification. This may result in a waiting period of several days. (deepl)

The next step is to check the validity of your ID.

What types of ID are accepted?
Swiss passport 
Swiss ID card
Swiss residence permit
(deepl)
Where can I find the number range? (deepl)
Please have your ID ready and point the camera at the area with the code line.\nAllow access to the camera so that the scan can be carried out. (deepl)
Your e-ID is ready. Please start the identification process by [date in 72 hours] at the latest. (deepl)
Please scan the ID again or use a different ID. (deepl)
Unfortunately, your order cannot be processed immediately due to high demand. You will be notified via the app as soon as it is your turn. This may take a few days. (deepl)
Would you like to store your e-ID on additional devices? (deepl)
Note\nFor security reasons, you can only do this now. It is not possible to save your e-ID on other devices at a later date. \n(deepl)
Password comprises between six and sixty-four characters
We attach great importance to the protection of your data and your privacy. To create an e-ID, we require your consent to the data protection declaration.
Your e-ID will probably be ready on %s. We will notify you as soon as it is ready. (deepl)
Your e-ID is ready. Please start the identification process by %s at the latest. (deepl)
You did not fully complete the ordering process. Please restart it to receive your e-ID.
Unable to retrieve the status status of your e-ID order.
Please verify your identity by 10. January 2025, at 10:07 AM, otherwise your order will be canceled.\nYour parents’ or legal guardian’s consent is still missing.
Your electronic identity is currently in the queue.\nYour parents’ or legal guardian’s consent is still missing.
Do you have a comprehensive guardianship?
Comprehensive guardianship means that another person (not your parents) makes all important decisions for you.
We need the consent of the parents or guardian to create this ID.
How would you like to proceed?
Your parent or guardian must scan the QR code with their own swiyu app to give consent for you.
QR code. Have the parent or guardian scan or share this code
An error occurred while generating the QR code.
Please verify your identity by %s, otherwise your order will be canceled.\n\nYour parents’ or legal guardian’s consent is still missing. You need to obtain the consent first in order to proceed.
Consent has been provided, your request is in the queue.
Your electronic identity is currently in the queue.\n\nAs soon as it’s your turn, you will receive a notification via the app.
Consent is missing, your e-ID is in the queue.

Your electronic identity is currently in the queue.

As soon as it’s your turn, you will receive a notification via the app.

Your parents’ or legal guardian’s consent is still missing.

Unfortunately, your ordering deadline has expired.

Reason: Your legal representative did not approve the order.

You can place a new order at any time.
Consent has been provided, you can start now with the verification process.
Please have a valid ID ready.
To use this app, your device must be secured. Please enable a screen lock (e.g., PIN, passphrase, or pattern) in your phone settings.
You will only be able to use the app after device security has been activated.
